lead_paragraph: Suspended Oakland Raiders linebacker Aldon Smith plans to return to football in two weeks, optimistic the NFL will grant his wish.

headline.print_headline: Suspended LB Aldon Smith Hopeful of Raiders Comeback Soon
headline.main: Suspended LB Aldon Smith Hopeful of Raiders Comeback Soon
